name: Grocer - A Cashierless Checkout
description:
Enjoy my rendition of a Crowwwn Design Challenge, cashierless grocery checkout. My creation of a few mobile app pages for a grocery store that allows you to skip the checkout line.


Prompt: "When I go grocery shopping, I want to be able to pay while I shop, so I don't have to spen time waiting in line to checkout."


Feel free to like and comment your thoughts and feedback!
